articles.title: Using Cygwin’s bash terminal in a JetBrains IDE
articles.summary: JetBrains IDEs are the best. IntelliJ, Android Studio, PHPStorm, PyCharm, and so on. I use IntelliJ Ultimate myself, which is kind of like all of their IDEs in one. One of the things I love about any JetBrains…
